detail_desc: Blouse in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front and a small frilled collar with ties. Buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in fine-knit slub cotton with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in fine-knit slub cotton with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Longer-style, slub-knit cotton jumper with a round neckline, asymmetric seam at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Longer-style, slub-knit cotton jumper with a round neckline, asymmetric seam at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a slub cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and visible seams at the back.
Jumper in a slub cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and visible seams at the back.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, button placket and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, button placket and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, button placket and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Slip-on trainers in cotton chambray with a padded top edge and elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a concealed elastic gore at the front. Toe caps and soles in thermoplastic rubber (TPR).
Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a concealed elastic gore at the front. Toe caps and soles in thermoplastic rubber (TPR).

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a shirt front, collar, sewn-on bow tie, button placket, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in airy silk with a sheen. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt. Concealed zip at the back and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib knit with a foldover edge at the top and long sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib knit with a foldover edge at the top and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in an airy mulberry silk weave with a round neckline and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved top in an airy mulberry silk weave with a round neckline and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Lightly padded gilet in functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, ventilating side panels in sturdy jersey and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
Lightly padded gilet in functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, ventilating side panels in sturdy jersey and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
Long trousers in softly draping mulberry silk with a high waist with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top. Pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, gently flared legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in patterned jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front, an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings on the shoulders and a patch pocket at the top. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Ribbed shorts with a small appliqué at the top, an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped pocket at the bottom of the back, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.

Sleeveless romper suit in ribbed jersey made from a soft organic cotton blend with buttons on the shoulders and an open chest pocket with a small appliqué. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Skirt in a lightly crêped viscose weave with pleats on one side at the top, a concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Jersey inner skirt.
Short-sleeved bolero in faux fur with a faceted button at the front. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved bolero in faux fur with a faceted button at the front. Satin lining.
Double-layered jersey hat with a small appliqué at the hem.

Set in woven fabric with a shirt, suit waistcoat and bow tie. Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable bow tie with a plastic fastener. Waistcoat with buttons down the front, fake welt front pockets and a back made from woven fabric with a sheen. Faux handkerchief in the chest pocket. Lined.
Ballet slippers with a decorative bow at the front and a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ballet slippers with a decorative bow at the front and a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elastication at the hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Briefs in a silk blend with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Ballet slippers in imitation suede with a decorative bow at the front and a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and soft rubber soles.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Dungaree shorts in organic cotton seersucker with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, a button at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a yoke. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, a drawstring with tassels at the waist, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a yoke. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, a drawstring with tassels at the waist, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and gently dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and gently dropped shoulders.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave. Lined.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover at the front, elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Scalloped lace trims at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover at the front, elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Scalloped lace trims at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Short dress in soft, stretch velvet jersey with a square neckline, long puff sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Imitation leather sandals with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with one side in soft faux fur. Zip at the top and an imitation leather shoulder strap with a chain at either end. Satin lining. Size approx. 15x19 cm.
Top in patterned jersey with an appliqué, long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Longer cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some alpaca wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jacket in soft thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Jacket in soft thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft, patterned thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck and wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with studs, open sides, an adjustable tab with elastication and a metal fastener, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
